rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with ample natural light and a clear path for wheelchair accessibility. The floor is designed to be non-slip.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area oriented towards the east to maximize morning sunlight as per Vastu principles. Includes wheelchair-accessible seating and unobstructed pathways.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functionally designed with a modular layout for easy movement, includes lower countertops for wheelchair accessibility and adherence to Kerala traditional design. Open ventilation is provided via windows aligned per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private space in the north-west quadrant for optimal energy flow. Incorporates a wheelchair-accessible design with wider doorways and accessible storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional sleeping area with easy access. The layout ensures smooth circulation for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom featuring grab bars and non-slip flooring.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Storage
rooms.description: Small utility space for extra storage or laundry area, designed to maintain unobstructed movement paths.

openings.description: Large entry for easy wheelchair access; incorporates traditional Kerala design elements.

Dual-car garage entrance with smooth threshold for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom (optional)
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space designed following the Kerala style and Vastu guidelines. Accessible via an internal staircase with a ramp option.
